SEARCH
Package model

Class World

java.lang.Object
model.World
public class World extends Object
The world is our model. It saves the bare minimum of information required to accurately reflect the state of the game. Note how this does not know anything about graphics.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a new world with the given size.

    • restart

      public void restart(Boolean gameState)
      Restarts the game and shows the start menu. Closes all open frames and sets the game state in the start menu.
      Parameters:
      gameState - the state of the game (true for win, false for lose, null for reset)

    • checkGamestate

      public void checkGamestate()
      Checks the current game state (win/lose) and restarts if necessary.

      isHard - true if the game should be in hard mode, false otherwise

    • registerView

      public void registerView(View view)
      Adds the given view of the world and updates it once. Once registered through this method, the view will receive updates whenever the world changes.
      Parameters:
      view - the view to be registered
